dcterms:creator: M. G Bellemare
M. C. Machado
G. Brockman
et al.
dcterms:description: Milk Factory is a game developed to benchmark the proposed scheme, simulating a task in a warehouse where robots automate the production chain. It involves pick-up robots and mechanic robots working together to maximize rewards by picking and placing milk bottles.
dcterms:title: Milk Factory

dcterms:creator: M. G Bellemare
M. C. Machado
G. Brockman
et al.
dcterms:description: The Arcade Learning Environment (ALE) is a platform for evaluating general agents in reinforcement learning tasks, providing a standard interface for various games.
dcterms:title: Arcade Learning Environment (ALE)

dcterms:creator: G. Brockman
et al.
dcterms:description: OpenAI Gym is a toolkit for developing and comparing reinforcement learning algorithms, providing a variety of environments to test and benchmark different approaches.
dcterms:title: OpenAI Gym
